content: windmill face scrubby crochet pattern by sarah gross materials g hook 4mm worsted weight cotton yarn #4 scissors needle for weaving in ends gauge scrubby measures approximately 3 ½ inches i tend to crochet tightly so check your gauge and adjust hook size accordingly abbreviations us terms chain - chain slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet fpdc front post double_crochet rsc reverse single_crochet also known as crab stitch st s stitch es rs right side ws wrong side notes repeat sections are notated with * * chain 3 counts as a double_crochet magic_ring tutorial https //craftykittycrochet com/2018/07/30/magic-ring-a-photo-tutorial/ reverse single_crochet/crab stitch tutorial http //www sigonimacaroni com/crab-stitch-crochet-tutorial/ page | 1 windmill face scrubby crochet pattern instructions magic_ring 1 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet 11 in ring pull ring tight to close slip_stitch to top of chain 3 to join 12 sts 2 chain 3 counts as double_crochet fpdc around chain 3 from previous round *double_crochet in the top of the next st fpdc around the same st * repeat around slip_stitch to top of chain 3 to join 24 sts 3 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in the top of the next st fpdc around the same st *double_crochet in the top of the next st double_crochet in the top of the next st fpdc around the same st * repeat around slip_stitch to top of chain 3 to join 36 sts 4 chain 1 does not count as st single_crochet in same st rsc around cut yarn and join to 1st single_crochet finishing weave in any remaining ends i would love to see your windmill face scrubbies tag me on instagram @craftsbysarahliz so i can see your work *permissions* -
